movie.title: La Llorona
movie.description_intro: An aging paranoid war criminal, protected by his faithful wife, faces death while being haunted by the ghosts of his past.
movie.description_full: An aging paranoid war criminal, protected by his faithful wife, faces death while being haunted by the ghosts of his past.

movies.title: Malibu Rescue: The Next Wave
movies.summary: It's summer again, and everyone's favorite Junior Rescuers, The Flounders, are back at Tower 2. With the International Junior Rescue Championships headed to Southern California, the eyes of the entire planet are on Malibu Beach. But when Team USA falls victim to a bout of food poisoning, it's up to Tyler, Dylan, Eric, Lizzie and Gina to represent their country in the world's most extreme lifeguard challenge.
movies.description_full: It's summer again, and everyone's favorite Junior Rescuers, The Flounders, are back at Tower 2. With the International Junior Rescue Championships headed to Southern California, the eyes of the entire planet are on Malibu Beach. But when Team USA falls victim to a bout of food poisoning, it's up to Tyler, Dylan, Eric, Lizzie and Gina to represent their country in the world's most extreme lifeguard challenge.

movies.title: Odds and Evens
movies.summary: The navy's detective gets his brother, the ex-gambler to help him liquidate an illegal gaming house on a yacht near Miami.
movies.description_full: The navy's detective gets his brother, the ex-gambler to help him liquidate an illegal gaming house on a yacht near Miami.
movies.synopsis: The navy's detective gets his brother, the ex-gambler to help him liquidate an illegal gaming house on a yacht near Miami.

movies.title: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
movies.title_english: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
movies.title_long: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998)
movies.summary: When a group of scientists are offered funding into genetic research if they agree to try and clone the greatest ever Pokémon, Mew, the end result is success and Mewtwo is born. However Mewtwo is bitter about his purpose in life and kills his masters. In order to become the greatest he throws open a challenge to the world to battle him and his Pokémon. Ash and his friends are one of the few groups of trainers who pass the first test and prepare for battle. However they soon find out about further cloning and Mewtwo's ultimate plan for the earth.
movies.description_full: When a group of scientists are offered funding into genetic research if they agree to try and clone the greatest ever Pokémon, Mew, the end result is success and Mewtwo is born. movies.title: Kill Chain
movies.summary: A hotel room shootout between two assassins kicks off a long night of bodies falling like dominoes, as we follow a chain of crooked cops, gangsters, hitmen, a femme Fatale and an ex-mercenary through a confluence of murder, betrayal, revenge and redemption.
